name: tm30
effect: Teaches Shadow Ball to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Shadow Ball to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Teleport)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Hurls a dark lump
at the foe. It may
lower SP. DEF.

hurled at the foe.
May also lower the
foe’s SP. DEF.
